Articles.Content:
I have been away from KSP for a few months now and I just updated (new download) to 1.2.2 and now when I try to load the program it hangs on the loading screen. I have updated the unity software but still no luck... 

Disregard, after doing further reading in forum (Duh!) I found the answer.....
Glad you already found your answer, closing this thread therefore.
